continuity: Sub + shall / will + (not) + have + been + v3 + O.

hindi: क्या पत्र भेजा गया होगा?
english: Will the letter have been sent?

hindi: क्या घर साफ किया गया होगा?
english: Will the house have been cleaned?

hindi: क्या रिपोर्ट पूरी की गई होगी?
english: Will the report have been completed?

hindi: क्या मीटिंग आयोजित की गई होगी?
english: Will the meeting have been organized?
